## Field.doValueInvalid\_() method

Used to notify the field an invalid value was input. Can be overridden by subclasses, see FieldTextInput. No-op by default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected doValueInvalid_(_invalidValue: any, _fireChangeEvent?: boolean): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

\_invalidValue


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The input value that was determined to be invalid.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

\_fireChangeEvent


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to fire a change event if the value changes.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
